price: 27. Farao zei: “Waarlijk, jullie boodschapper die naar jullie toe is gestuurd is een dwaas!”
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qāla inna rasūlakumu alladhī ur'sila ilaykum lamajnūnun
